answers.answer: I can only respond to what causes type 1 diabetes with the experience that I have from my son who was 10 when he was diagnosed.  He also was very sick in the hospital.  Type 1 Diabetes is an autoimmune disorder.  The immune system attacks the inlet cells that are located in the pancreas they are what makes the insulin our bodies need.  With type 1 you are dependent on insulin shots to live.  I hope things will turn out for your friend.  I don't know anything about the brain swelling.  She will need a lot of support. There is a lot to learn for her. There is much more but this is a brief summary. My experience is that the medical community seems to be very supportive and full of knowledge.I wish you all the best

title: swelling on the brain-type 1 diabetes
